ai-vv70:1.1_0: “This one whose mind is freed from stones,
ai-vv70:1.3_0: While the seven peaks there are seven gamblings,
ai-vv70:1.4_0: covetousness is like noble crystal lamps,
ai-vv70:2.3_0: Whose mind is not developed like this?
ai-vv70:3.1_0: he is pleased with the god.
ai-vv70:3.3_0: It is the fruit of that deed,
ai-vv70:4.1_0: “In humans, I was a human being.
ai-vv70:4.2_0: Having seen that mendicant, full of defilements,
ai-vv70:4.3_0: he sent his alms food to the country.
ai-vv70:5.3_0: and my complexion was like me.”
ai-vv70:6.1_0: of alms at the sixth day.
